sect2.title: Installation of Ncurses
sect2.para: Install Ncurses by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: ./configure --prefix=/usr --libdir=/lib \ --with-shared --disable-termcap && make && make install && cd /lib && mv *.a /usr/lib && chmod 755 *.5.2 && cd /usr/lib && ln -sf libncurses.a libcurses.a && ln -sf ../../lib/libncurses.so && ln -sf ../../lib/libcurses.so && ln -sf ../../lib/libform.so && ln -sf ../../lib/libpanel.so && ln -sf ../../lib/libmenu.so
